Notes: Killed in the Wadi a-Salqa neighborhood.

Name: Ahmad Nael Nizar Mahdi
Notes: Killed in the street on his way to the vegetable market in the western part of the refugee camp with two friends. The friends were injured. A rocket had been fired from the area about half an hour earlier.

Name: Qassem Jaber 'Udwan 'Odeh
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people inside it. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Siraj Iyad 'Ali 'Abd al-'Aal
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people inside it. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: 'Abdallah Muhammad Ahmad Kaware'
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people inside it. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Muhammad 'Ali Faraj Kaware'
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people inside it. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Basel Salem Hussein Kaware'
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people who were inside. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Muhammad Ibrahim 'Odeh Kaware'
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people who were inside. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Hussein Yusef Hussein Kaware'
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people who were inside. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: 'Ammar Muhammad Ahmad Judah
Notes: Killed along with seven others in the strike on the Kaware' family home, which collapsed on the people who were inside. Another person, who was injured in the incident, later died of his wounds.

Name: Khader Hussein Ibrahim al-Bashliqi
Notes: Killed together with two additional operatives in Hamas's military branch while traveling in a car.

Name: Amjad Jum'ah Sa'id Sha'ban
Notes: Killed together with two additional operatives in the military branch of Hamas while traveling in a car.

Name: Muhammad Sa'id Ahmad Sha'ban
Notes: Killed together with two additional operatives in Hamas's military branch while traveling in a car.

Name: Rashad a-Din 'Abd a-Rahman Hussein Yasin
Notes: Killed while present with other operatives in a military branch on farmland in the refugee camp.

Name: Mazen Faraj Muhammad al-Jarbeh
Notes: Killed along with another armed individual as they fired a rocket at Israel.

Name: Marwan Hassan Muhammad Islim
Notes: Killed along with another armed individual as they fired a rocket at Israel.

Name: Yusef Ahmad Bani Gharrah
Notes: Killed by several shots to the upper torso while walking in the street in the company of several other young men. The shots were fired by uniformed and plainclothes Israeli security forces who were on an arrest raid in the refugee camp.

Name: Muhammad Zayed Salem A'beid
Notes: Killed while he was with other armed militants.

Name: Muhammad Muhammad Ramadan al-Fasih
Notes: Killed while travelling in a car with another armed militant, who was also killed.

Name: Ousamah Hassan Musa al-Hassumi
Notes: Killed while travelling in a car with another armed militant, who was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Sa'id So'ud Khaled
Notes: Shot by security forces that entered Nablus during Operation Brother's Keeper, after he moved towards them and did not respond to their calls to stop. Suffered from mental illness.

Name: Mustafa Hussni Taher Aslan
Notes: Shot in the head by soldiers who entered Qalandiya refugee camp during Operation Brother's Keeper, while he was on the roof of his house. Died of his wounds on 25 June 2014. According to the IDF Spokesperson, an improvised grenade was hurled in the incident at a soldier, who was lightly wounded.

Name: Muhammad Jihad Muhammad Dudin
Notes: Shot by soldiers in clashes that broke out in Dura after troops entered the town during Operation Brother's Keeper.

Name: Ahmad 'Arafat Hussni Samad'ah
Notes: Shot by soldiers in clashes that began in al-Jalazun Refugee Camp after troops entered the camp during Operation Brother's Keeper. The military says he took part in stone-throwing.

Name: 'Ali 'Abd a-Latif Ahmad al-'Awour
Notes: Wounded while riding a motorcycle with his uncle and died of his wounds on 14 June 2014. The uncle died immediately. Passengers in a passing car were also wounded.

Name: Muhammad Ahmad 'Abd a-Latif al-'Awour
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with his 10-year-old nephew, who was also hit and died of his wounds on 14 June 2014. Passengers in a passing car were also wounded.

Name: 'Alaa Muhammad 'Awad 'Odeh
Notes: Shot to death by soldiers and Border Police officers at Za'tara checkpoint after he fired a handgun at them, injuring a soldier.

Name: Nadim Siyam Ahmad Nawarah
Notes: Shot in the chest and killed in a demonstration that included stone-throwing. Was not throwing stones when killed. Another person was killed in the incident.

Name: Muhammad Mahmoud 'Odeh Salamah
Notes: Shot in the back and killed in a demonstration that included stone-throwing. Was not throwing stones when killed. Another person was killed in the incident.

Name: Muhammad 'Omar Saleh Abu Zeinah
Notes: Member of the military wing of the Islamic Jihad. Shot while carrying the body of Hamzah Abu al-Heija who had been killed just before by security personnel gunfire. Abu al-Heija had been killed in the course of an arrest raid to apprehend him. Before Abu al-Heija, another person had been killed while throwing Molotov cocktails at security personnel in the course of clashes that erupted in the refugee camp.

Name: Yazan Mahmoud Bassem Jabarin
Notes: Shot while throwing Molotov cocktails at security personnel in clashes between residents of the refugee camp and troops on an arrest raid to apprehend Hamzah Abu al-Heija. Abu al-Heija was killed by security forces’ gunfire shortly thereafter and another person in the refugee camp was killed while carrying Abu al-Heija’s body.

Name: Hamzah Jamal 'Abd a-Salam Abu al-Heija
Notes: Member of the military wing of Hamas. Shot in the course of an arrest raid to apprehend him. Abu al-Heija holed up in a home, and exchanges of gunfire between him and Border Police officers of the Special Central Unit ensued. The police also fired a rocket at the house. Abu al-Heija was shot outside the home in which he had holed up. Earlier, another person had been killed in the refugee camp while throwing Molotov cocktails at security personnel in the course of clashes that erupted there. Another person was killed while carrying Abu al-Heija’s body.

Name: Yusef Sami Yusef a-Shwamrah
Notes: Fired at by soldiers in ambush after he and two friends went through a gap in the Security Barrier in order to gather the gundelia plant.

Name: 'Abd a-Shafi Saleh Mahmoud Abu Mu'ammar
Notes: Killed firing mortar shells. Two other armed individuals who were with him at the time were killed as well.

Name: Shaher Hamuda Mahmoud Abu Shanab
Notes: Killed firing mortar shells. Two other armed individuals who were with him at the time were killed as well.

Name: Isma'il Hamed 'Abed Abu Judah
Notes: Killed firing mortar shells. Two other armed individuals who were with him at the time were killed as well.

Name: Saji Sayel Muhammad Jarab'ah
Notes: Sustained gunfire wound to the head when soldiers fired at him from ambush near Route 60. Military says he had been throwing stones at the road.

Name: Raed 'Alaa a-Din Nafe'a Z'eiter
Notes: A Palestinian and Jordanian citizen. Shot by Israeli soldiers at Allenby Crossing, the crossing between the West Bank and Jordan. Shot after he argued with a soldier and shoved him.

Name: Mus'ab Musa Saber a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed in attempt to fire rockets at Israel together with another armed individual, who was killed as well.

Name: Sharif Yusef Ahmad Naser
Notes: Killed in attempt to fire rockets at Israel together with another armed individual, who was killed as well.

Name: Amneh 'Atiyyah Mahmoud Qdeih
Notes: Mentally disturbed. Hit after dark by firing from military tower while she was near Gaza border fence. Her body was found by relatives the next morning.

Name: Mu'taz 'Abd a-Rahim Ahmad Washahah
Notes: Member of the military wing of the Popular Front. Killed by gunfire at his family’s home when he refused to give himself up to the security forces who had come to apprehend him. The house was partially destroyed in the course of the operation.

Name: Ibrahim Salman Muhammad Mansur
Notes: Hit in the head by firing from military tower while collecting gravel approx. 100 meters from Gaza border fence. Military claims he tried to damage fence.

Name: Muhammad Mahmoud 'Abd al-'Aziz Mubarak
Notes: Shot by soldiers. According to the military, the soldiers fired after Mubarak opened fire at a nearby military tower.

Name: Bilal Samir Ahmad 'Aweidah
Notes: Shot several meters away from the Gaza perimeter fence while wandering about with two friends. Other teenagers were also strolling near the fence in the same area. Military officials say he was trying to sabotage the fence.

Name: Muhammad Yusef Ahmad a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed sitting outside the home of Ahmad a-Z’anin who was the object of a targeted assassination and was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Jum'ah Khalil a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed while sitting outside his home with another person, who was also killed.

Name: 'Adnan Jamil Shehdeh Abu Khater
Notes: Shot near the Gaza perimeter fence. Military officials say he was trying to sabotage the fence. Died of his wounds a day later.

Name: Hala Ahmad Salman Abu Sbeikhah
Notes: Aged 2-years and eight months old. Killed by a shell when she was outside in the yard of her home. Two additional shells were later fired at her home. Three of the girl’s relatives were wounded in the shelling.

Name: 'Odeh Jihad 'Odeh Hamad
Notes: Shot adjacent to Gaza perimeter fence while collecting scraps at a garbage dump, north-east of Beit Hanoun.

Name: Saleh Samir 'Abd a-Rahman Yasin
Notes: Member of Palestinian security forces. Fired at soldiers and then shot to death by them. According to IDF Spokesperson, the soldiers were on site for an arrest operation.

Name: Nafe'a Jamil Nafe'a a-S'adi
Notes: Member of the military wing of the Islamic Jihad. Killed in exchanges of fire between armed Palestinians and Israeli SWAT team (Special Central Unit). According to IDF Spokesperson, the troops were on site for an arrest operation.

Name: Wajih Wajdi Wajih a-Ramahi
Notes: Was present in a place where teenagers were throwing stones at soldiers located approximately 200 meters away when soldiers shot him in the back. B’Tselem does not have information as to whether or not a-Ramahi took part in the stone-throwing.

Name: Musa Muhammad Musa Makhamreh
Notes: Member of Mujahidin Advocacy Council. Military, ISA and police forces fired at his car in course of arrest raid. Another armed Palestinian who was in the car with him was also killed. A third member of same armed group was killed in the course of an operation for his arrest in al-Karmil.

Name: Mahmoud Khaled Mahmoud a-Najar
Notes: Member of Mujahidin Advocacy Council.  Military, ISA and police forces fired at him on roof of his home in course of arrest raid in which two other members of same armed group were killed in their car in Yatta.

Name: Muhammad Fouad Jamil Neiroukh
Notes: Member of Mujahidin Advocacy Council. Military, ISA and police forces fired at his car in course of arrest raid. Another armed Palestinian who was in the car with him was also killed. A third member of same armed group was killed in the course of an operation for his arrest in al-Karmil.

Name: Anas Fouad Rifa'i al-Atrash
Notes: Shot after exiting his brother’s car when it stopped at the Container Checkpoint. According to the police, he attempted to stab a Border Police officer at the checkpoint.

Name: Bashir Sami Salem Habanin
Notes: Shot to death by Border Police officers and soldiers after he fired firecrackers at Tapuah Junction.

Name: Muhammad 'Issam 'Omar al-Qassas
Notes: Killed in an airstrike on a tunnel into Israel. The bombing caused the detonation of explosives in the tunnel. Two other members of armed Palestinian groups were killed as well. His body and the body of one of the other two were not found.

Name: Muhammad Rashid Hussein Dawood
Notes: Killed in an airstrike on a tunnel into Israel. The bombing caused the detonation of explosives in the tunnel. Two other members of armed Palestinian groups were killed as well. His body and the body of one of the other two were not found.

Name: Khaled Muhammad Jum'ah Abu Bakrah
Notes: Killed in an airstrike on a tunnel into Israel. The bombing caused the detonation of explosives in the tunnel. Two other members of armed Palestinian groups were killed as well and their bodies were not found.

Name: Rabi' Khalil Suliman Abu Barakah
Notes: Killed in gunfire exchange with military forces that entered the Gaza Strip in order to blow up a tunnel leading into Israel.

Name: Ahmad 'Imad Yusef Tazaz'ah
Notes: Killed by shooting during a confrontation with military forces in a market near Qabatiya.

Name: Muhammad Rabah Shukri 'Asi
Notes: Member of the military wing of the Islamic Jihad. Killed during an exchange of gunfire with soldiers when they came to arrest him in a cave in which he was hiding.

Name: Yunes Ahmad Mahmoud a-Radaydeh
Notes: Shot by soldiers after breaking into a military base while driving a tractor.

Name: Hweishel Isma'il Hweishel al-Hanajreh
Notes: Killed after trying to cross Gaza perimeter fence into Israel for work. Had no permit. Once discovered, ran back; after crossing the fence back into Gaza, was shot. His body was found approx. 400 meters from the fence.

Name: Islam Husam Sa'id Tubasi
Notes: Wanted individual. Injured by bullets fired in the course of a joint police and military raid to arrest him at home. Died of his wounds later that day.

Name: Yunes Jamal Muhammad Jahjouh
Notes: Killed by military fire during clashes that erupted in the course of an arrest at the refugee camp. Took part in stone-throwing at the Israeli security forces during the clashes. Two other people were killed in the same incident.

Name: Rubin 'Abd a-Rahman Hussein Zayed
Notes: UNRWA employee. Killed by military fire during clashes that erupted in the course of an arrest in the refugee camp. Took no part in the clashes. Two other people were killed in the same incident.

Name: Jihad Mansur Harbi Aslan
Notes: Injured by military fire during clashes that erupted in the course of an arrest in the refugee camp. Took part in stone-throwing at the Israeli security forces during the clashes. Died of his wounds later that day. Two other people were killed in the same incident.

Name: Karim Subhi Muhammad Saleh
Notes: Injured by shots fired by soldiers during clashes and exchanges of gunfire in the course of an arrest operation at the refugee camp. Took part in stone-throwing at the soldiers. Died of his wounds about ten days later. Another man was killed in the same incident.

Name: Majd Muhammad Ahmad Lahlouh
Notes: Killed by military fire during clashes and exchanges of gunfire that took place in the course of an arrest at the refugee camp. Took part in stone-throwing at the Israeli security forces. Another person who was injured in the same incident died of his wounds about ten days later.

Name: Mu'taz Idris 'Abd al-Fatah Sharawnah
Notes: Shot in the back during clashes with IDF force.

Name: Haitham Ziad Ibrahim al-Mishal
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle in western Gaza City.

Name: Naji 'Abd a-Salam Naji al-Balbisi
Notes: Shot in the back by soldiers near the Einav/Anabta checkpoint after arriving there with several other people, one of whom threw a Molotov cocktail at the guard tower. The Palestinian who threw the Molotov cocktail was also killed.

Name: 'Amer Ibrahim Naji Nassar
Notes: Shot by soldiers near the Einav/Anabta checkpoint after he threw a Molotov cocktail at the guard tower. Another person was killed with him.

Name: Mahmoud 'Adel Fares a-Titi
Notes: Shot by soldiers who entered a refugee camp in a vehicle and began firing after their vehicle got stuck and civilians in the camp threw stones at them.

Name: Mahmoud Wajih 'Abd al-Hamid 'Awwad
Notes: Hit in the back of the head by a rubber-coated metal bullet fired by a soldier in clashes near Qalandiya Checkpoint. Died of his wounds on 28 November 2013.

Name: Muhammad Samih Hussein 'Asfur
Notes: Wounded in the head during a demonstration in the course of which youths threw stones, and died of his injuries in an Israeli hospital about two weeks later.

Name: Lubna Munir Sa'id al-Hanash
Notes: Hit by shots a soldier fired near Route 60 while she was walking on the grounds of Al-‘ Arrub College, after a Molotov cocktail was thrown at an Israeli car traveling along the road ahead of the vehicle in which the soldier who fired and the second-in-command of the Yehuda Brigade were passengers.

Name: Saleh Ahmad Sa'id al-'Amarin
Notes: Wounded when shot in the head during a confrontation that developed in front of the military guard tower near Rachel's Tomb, between Palestinian youths and soldiers. He died of his injuries a few days later.

Name: Samir Ahmad Muhammad 'Awad
Notes: Died when shot by soldiers near the Separation Barrier. He had crossed the first barbed wire fence in the barrier and was shot in the back and the head while trying to flee an ambush by soldiers on his way back to Budrus.

Name: 'Udai Muhammad Salamah Darawish
Notes: Shot by soldiers as he entered Israel for the purpose of work. Did not have an entry permit.

Name: Anwar Muhammad 'Alian al-Mamluk
Notes: Killed about 50 meters from the perimeter fence, while with a group of people trying to approach the fence.

Name: Muhammad Ziad 'Awad a-Salaymeh
Notes: Killled trying to cross Checkpoint 160 in Hebron after attacking a Border Policewoman who was standing at the checkpoint, while he was holding a cigarette lighter made to look like a gun.

Name: Hatem Mustafa Hussein Shadid
Notes: Killed after using an ax to attack passengers in a military vehicle he crashed into. According to the IDF spokesman, the shooter works for the General Security Services.

Name: Mahmoud 'Ali Ahmad Jarghon
Notes: Wounded while riding a motorcycle near the perimeter fence in eastern Rafah. Died of his injuries at the hospital that same day.

Name: Anwar 'Abd al-Hadi Muslem Qdeih
Notes: Killed near the perimeter fence, where he was present with a group of people who went there after the agreements published at the end of Operation Pillar of Defense that made it permissible to approach the fence.

Name: 'Abd a-Rahman Majdi Na'im
Notes: Killed by a direct hit on his house in the a-Rimal neighborhood of Gaza City.

Name: Nader Yasser Suliman Abu Mgheiseb
Notes: Killed in a bombing near the mosque on the street where he lived.

Name: 'Abdallah Tal'at Ahmad Ibrahim
Notes: Killed while walking in the eastern part of Rafah with a friend, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Kamel Salamah Abu 'Adwan
Notes: Killed while walking in eastern Rafah with a comrade, also killed.

Name: Mubarak Ibrahim Mubarak Abu Ghulah
Notes: Killed while on agricultural land in northwestern a-Nuseirat R.C.

Name: 'Abir Talal Sa'di al-'Asali
Notes: Killed with her father and brother in an agricultural area near her house in Jabalya R.C.

Name: Ayman Talal Sa'di al-'Asali
Notes: Killed with his father and sister in an agricultural area near his house in Jabalya R.C.

Name: Talal Sa'di Mahmoud al-'Asali
Notes: Killed with two of his children in an agricltural area near his house in Jabalya R.C.

Name: Mahmoud 'Atiyyah 'Abd a-Razeq Abu Khusah
Notes: Killed on his way to a shop near his house.

Name: Amirah Ahmad Ibrahim Abu Naser
Notes: Killed while picking olives with her grandfather, who was also killed.

Name: Ibrahim Mahmoud Naser Abu Naser
Notes: Killed while picking olives with his granddaughter, who was also killed.

Name: Mustafa 'Awad Mustafa Abu Hmeidan
Notes: Killed while trying to launch a rocket at Israel from a tunnel in Jabalya R.C.

Name: 'Abd a-Rahman 'Amer 'Abd a-Rahman 'Ayesh
Notes: Killed while walking in a-Sheikh Radwan, Gaza City.

Name: Ibrahim Muhisen Muhammad Shihadah
Notes: Killed after launching rockets at Israel from the Tal a-Za'atar neighborhood of the Jabalya R.C.

Name: Ahmad Maher Sa'di Abu Kamil
Notes: Killed when his father's house was bombed while armed men from the military wing of Hamas were present; four of the armed men were also killed.

Name: Nidal Muhammad Muhammad Hassan
Notes: Killed when the Abu Kamel family's house was bombed while armed men from the military wing of Hamas were present; four of the armed men were also killed.

Name: Sa'di Maher Sa'di Abu Kamil
Notes: Killed in the bombing of his father's house while armed men from the military wing of Hamas were present; four other armed men were also killed.

Name: Muhammad Salamah Sa'id Abu 'Ateiwi
Notes: Killed in the bombing of the Abu Kamel family's house while armed men from the military wing of Hamas were present; four other armed men were also killed.

Name: Rami 'Abd Rabo 'Awwad A'beid
Notes: Killed in the bombing of the Abu Kamel family's house while armed men from the military wing of Hamas were present; four other armed men were also killed.

Name: Fadi Musa Samir al-Qatnani
Notes: Killed while walking in Beit Lahya.

Name: Muhammad 'Adnan Mahmoud al-Ashqar
Notes: Killed while trying to launch rockets at Israel together with other armed men.

Name: Fares Mansur Ahmad Esbatiyeh
Notes: Killed while acting as lookout in the eastern a-Shujayah area of Gaza City.

Name: Khaled A'bed Ibrahim Abu Mur
Notes: Wounded while riding a motorcycle with his brother, who was active with the military wing of Hamas and was  killed; he died of his wounds en route to the European Hospital in Rafah.

Name: Ahmad A'bed Ibrahim Abu Mur
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with his brother, who died of his wounds a shorrt time later on his way to the European Hospital in Rafah.

Name: Muhammad Muhammad Khader Baker
Notes: Killed while riding with Saleh Daghmash in the latter's car together with Zaki Qadadeh, both also killed.

Name: Hassan Yusef Hassan al-Austaz
Notes: Killed while walking near the mosque in Deir al-Balah with another armed man, who was also killed. He had launched rockets earlier that day.

Name: Muhammad Musa Mahmoud Abu 'Eishah
Notes: Killed while walking near the mosque in Deir al-Balah together with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Ibrahim Rizeq 'Ashur
Notes: Killed while playing with other childen in an olive grove belonging to his family.

Name: Ibrahim Ahmad Mahmoud Hamad
Notes: Killed while hunting birds about 400 meters from the perimeter fence, together with a friend, who was also killed.

Name: Mahmoud Khalil Mahmoud al-'Arja
Notes: Killed while hunting birds about 400 meters from the perimeter fence, together with a friend, who was also killed.

Name: Zaki Sa'id Muhammad Qadadah
Notes: Killed while riding in a car belonging to Saleh Daghmash together with Daghmash and Muhammad Baker, who were also killed.

Name: Mus'ab Mahmoud Rushdi Daghmash
Notes: Killed while riding in a car belonging to Subhi Daghmash, also killed. Riding with them was Ahmad Daghmash, also killed. Another passenger was wounded.

Name: Shawqi Salman Silmi Abu Sneimah
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle in a-Shuka, Rafah.

Name: Mahmoud 'Ali Ahmad al-Kumi
Notes: Worked at the Hamas TV station, "Al-Aqsa". Killed when a missile hit the car in which he was riding in Gaza City, together with a colleague.

Name: Husam Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman Salamah
Notes: Worked at the Hamas TV station, Al-Aqsa. Killed when a missile hit the car in which he was riding in Gaza City, together with a colleague.

Name: Mahmoud Muhammad Hussein a-Zuhri
Notes: Killed on the street in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, in the bombing of the a-Shawa family's house, shortly after the passage of a cavalcade of Arab foreign ministers and the Turkish foreign minister. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: Tareq 'Awni Mustafa Hajilah
Notes: Killed on the street in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, when the a-Shawa family's house was bombed, shortly after passage of a calvacade of Arab foreign ministers and the Turkish foreign minister. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: Saqer Yusef Khalil Bulbul
Notes: Killed on the street in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, when the a-Shawa family's house was bombed, shortly after passage of a calvacade of Arab foreign ministers and the Turkish foreign minister. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: Yusra Basel Murtada a-Shawa
Notes: Killed in the bombing of her house in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, shortly after the passage of a calvacade of Arab foreign ministers and the Turkish foreign minister. Three other civilians, who were watching the calvacade, were killed on the street.

Name: Muhammad Ahmad Sa'id Abu Sitah
Notes: Killed while walking in western a-Zawaydah with his uncle, active with the military wing of Hamas, who was also killed.

Name: Salem 'Ayesh Hussein Abu Sitah
Notes: Killed while walking in western a-Zawaydah with his nephew, who was also killed.

Name: Ayman Rafiq Muhammad Abu Rashed
Notes: Killed near the perimeter fence, together with other armed men.

Name: 'Odeh 'Arafat 'Odeh a-Shanadi
Notes: Killed on the ground in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, with another armed man, also killed.

Name: Amin Mahmoud As'ad a-Dada
Notes: Killed on the ground in a-Shujayah, Gaza City, with another armed man, also killed.

Name: Salah Nimer Muhammad Daghmash
Notes: Killed while riding in his car with Zaki Qadadah and Muhammad Baker, who were also killed.

Name: Subhi Nimer Muhammad Daghmash
Notes: Killed while riding in a car with Ahmad and Mus'ab Daghmash, who were also killed. Another passenger was wounded.

Name: Ahmad Jamil Hamdan Daghmash
Notes: Killed while riding in a car belonging to Subhi Daghmash, also killed. Riding with them was Mus'ab Daghmash, also killed, and Hamdan Daghmash, who was wounded.

Name: Muhammad 'Abd Rabo Yusef Bader
Notes: Killed while acting as lookout north of Deir al-Balah.

Name: 'Abd a-Rahman Mustafa 'Abd a-Rahman Hamad
Notes: Killed while acting as lookout together with other armed men near the perimeter fence.

Name: Yihya Muhammad Yihya 'Awad
Notes: Killed while hunting birds in northern Beit Lahya.

Name: Bilal Muheisen Khalil al-Barawi
Notes: Killed while launching rockets at Israel together with other armed men.

Name: Mahmoud Rizeq Salman a-Zahar
Notes: Killed while standing near his house with his infant son.

Name: Yihya Akram Muhammad M'aruf
Notes: Killed while walking in al-'Atatrah neighbourhood , Beit Lahya.

Name: Mahmoud Sami A'beid Sha'th
Notes: Wounded while riding in a taxi on the Khan Yunis-Rafah road with another armed man, and died of his wounds about ten days later. The taxi driver and the other armed man were also killed.

Name: Sabah Muhammad Harb a-Skafi
Notes: Wounded on her way from the UNRWA clinic in a-Tofah to her house in a-Shujayah in Gaza City.

Name: Hamdi Muhammad Jawad Musa al-Fallah
Notes: Killed while aiming a laser pen at soldiers during confrontations between them and Palestinians near the Halhul-Hebron bridge on Route 35.

Name: Husam Faiz Hamdan 'Abd al-Jawad
Notes: Killed while riding in his car on his way to his house in the Naser area of Gaza City.

Name: Ahmad Tawfiq Mamduh a-Nesasreh
Notes: Killed in a bombing that destroyed his house in Rafah; one of his brothers was also killed

Name: Muhammad Tawfiq Mamduh a-Nesasreh
Notes: Killed in a bombing that destroyed his house in Rafah. One of his brothers was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Fouad Khalil Hijazi
Notes: Killed when his house was bombed. His father and brother were also killed.

Name: Suhaib Fouad Khalil Hijazi
Notes: Killed when his house was bombed. His father and brother were also killed.

Name: Fouad Khalil Ibrahim Hijazi
Notes: Killed when his house was bombed. Two of his children were also killed.

Name: Khalil Ibrahim 'Abd al-'Aziz Shihadah
Notes: Killed while walking in a-Nuseirat R.C. a few hundred meters from his mother's house to his own house, together with his nephew, who was also killed.

Name: Ousamah Walid Ibrahim Shihadah
Notes: Killed while accompanying his uncle on foot a few hundred meters in a-Nuseirat R.C.; his uncle was also killed.

Name: Amin Ramadan Mardi al-Mallahi
Notes: Killed about 150 meters from his house while returning from his family's factory.

Name: 'Aead Sabri Muhammad Radi
Notes: Killed while launching rockets at Israel from farmland in the western part of a-Nuseirat R.C. together with other armed men.

Name: Arkan Harbi Jamal Abu Kamil
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel, from north of the al-Bureij R.C., together with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Ibrahim Mahmoud Jebril al-Huajri
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel, from north of the al-Bureij R.C., together with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Ramez Najib Musa Harb
Notes: A ranking member of the organization. Killed while at the Islamic Jihad media office in the al-Shuruq building in central Gaza City.

Name: Muhammad Zidan Zayed Tbeil
Notes: Killed while sleeping at home in the a-Nuseirat R.C., when parts of the building's roof collapsed onto his head and chest.

Name: 'Ahed Hamdi Isma'il al-Katati
Notes: Killed while helping members of the Abu Zur family flee their home, which was damaged when the house next door, belonging to Islamic Jihad activist Khaled Azzam, was bombed. Three members of the Abu Zur family were also killed.

Name: Muhammad Iyad Fouad Abu Zor
Notes: Killed while running from his house after it was damaged in the bombing of a nearby house belonging to an Islamic Jihad activist. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: Sahar Fadi As'ad Abu Zor
Notes: Killed while running from her house after it was damaged in the bombing of a nearby house belonging to an Islamic Jihad activist. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: Nasmah Helmi Salem Abu Zor
Notes: Killed while running from her house after it was damaged in the bombing of a nearby house belonging to an Islamic Jihad activist. Three other civilians were also killed.

Name: al-'Abed Muhammad al-'Abed al-'Attar
Notes: Killed in front of his house while covering crates of potatoes on a donkey cart, which he used for selling the potatoes.

Name: 'Omar Mahmoud Muhammad al-Astal
Notes: Killed returning home from his uncle's olive grove; his uncle, who was with him, was also killed.

Name: Ibrahim Muhammad Suliman al-Astal
Notes: Killed on returning home from his olive grove. His nephew, who was with him, was also killed.

Name: Mahmoud Sa'id Suliman Abu Khater
Notes: Killed standing near his house in eastern Khan Yunis with his infant son and a relative who was also killed.

Name: 'Abdallah Harb Salem Abu Khater
Notes: Killed standing near a relative's house, talking with him; the relative was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Riyad As'ad Shamalakh
Notes: Killed while riding in a rented car in southern Gaza City.

Name: Rashid 'Alian 'Atiyyah Abu 'Amrah
Notes: Killed while riding in a pickup, transporting crates of vegetables in western Deir al-Balah, together with two other farmers, who were also killed.

Name: Tamer Rushdi Muhammad Bashir
Notes: Killed while riding in a pickup, transporting crates of vegetables in western Deir al-Balah, together with two other farmers, who were also killed.

Name: Amin Zuhdi Ibrahim Bashir
Notes: Killed while riding in a pickup, transporting crates of vegetables in western Deir al-Balah, together with two other farmers, who were also killed.

Name: Muhammad Salamah Sa'di Jundiyah
Notes: Killed while sitting in a square in a-Shujayah, Gaza City.

Name: Husam Muhammad Hamdan a-Zini
Notes: Killed while transporting, in his car, two armed men on the Khan Yunis-Rafah road.

Name: Seif a-Din Mahmoud Suliman Sadeq
Notes: Killed while riding in a taxi on the Khan Yunis-Rafah road, together with another armed man, who died of his wounds about ten days later. The taxi driver was also killed.

Name: Musa Mahmoud Jum'ah a-Smeiri
Notes: Killed when he was alone on agricultural land near his house.

Name: Naser Zidan Salem a-Nahal
Notes: Wounded during the targeted killing of Ahmad a-Nahal, an activist with the military wing of Hamas, and died of his injuries about three weeks later. Ahmad a-Nahal and another civilian were also killed.

Name: Muhammad Jamal Muhammad a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of his family in their home. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Manzar family next door.

Name: Judah Suliman 'Umran Shamalakh
Notes: Wounded in an agricultural area in a-Sheikh Ajlin, Gaza City, and died of his wounds four days later.

Name: Jalal Muhammad Saleh Naser
Notes: Wounded while on the roof of his house in Jabalya R.C. with his six-year-old son, who was killed along with him. He died of his wounds a few hours later.

Name: 'Atiyyah 'Abdallah Muhammad Mubarak
Notes: Affiliated with Hamas; killed on his way to the Hassan al-Bana mosque, where he was imam. That same attack also killed another man who was sitting at his doorstep.

Name: Husam Hassan Muhammad Abu Shawish
Notes: Killed sitting on his doorstep in a-Nuseirat R.C. That same attack killed the imam of the Hassan al-Bana mosque who was walking along the street at the time.

Name: Ahmad 'Issam Sami a-Nahal
Notes: Killed while standing on his doorstep.Two civilians were also killed.

Name: Tasnim Zuheir Muhammad a-Nahal
Notes: Killed as she walked on the street during the targeted killing of Ahmad a-Nahal, an activist with the military wing of Hamas, at his front door. he and another civilian were also killed.

Name: Nawal Faraj Mahmoud 'Abd al-'Aal
Notes: Killed in her home in a-Tofah in Gaza City, during the bombing of the police station nearby.

Name: Sa'diyah Muhammad 'Aydi a-Dib
Notes: Killed while she was feeding the chickens she raised on farmland near her house in a-Shujayah, Gaza City.

Name: Ahmad Suliman Rabi' Abu Nqeirah
Notes: Killed while in an agricultural area near the house of a Hamas activist that was attacked, in the a-Shaburah R.C. in Rafah.

Name: Hussein Jalal Muhammad Naser
Notes: Killed while on the roof of his house in the Jabalya R.C. with his father, who died of his injuries a few hours later.

Name: 'Imad 'Abd al-Karim Hussein Abu Hamdah
Notes: Wounded at a-Shuhada Square in a-Shati' R.C. and died of his wounds the next day.

Name: Nabil Ahmad 'Odeh Abu 'Amrah
Notes: Killed while walking in southern Gaza City with a relative, who was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Mahmoud Ahmad Abu 'Amrah
Notes: Killed while walking in southern Gaza City with a relative, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Baker 'Aref al-'Ef
Notes: Killed in a bombing of the Naser neighborhood, Gaza City.

Name: 'Ashur Soheil 'Ashur Hamadah
Notes: Killed while riding in a car carrying containers of water with his son, who was also killed.

Name: Soheil 'Ashur Muhammad Hamadah
Notes: Killed while riding in a car carrying containers of water with his son, who was also killed.

Name: Sami 'Imad Subhi al-Ghafir
Notes: Killed while with other armed men east of a-Shujayah in Gaza City.

Name: Samah 'Abd al-Hamid Ishaq a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with nine other members of her family while they were at home. In that bombing two members of the al-Maznar family in the house next door were also killed.

Name: 'Abdallah Muhammad Ramadan al-Mzannar
Notes: Killed with his grandmother in the bombing of the a-Dalu family's house next door, in which nine members of the a-Dalu family were killed.

Name: Amineh Matar Hassan al-Mzannar
Notes: Killed with her grandson in the bombing of the a-Dalu family's house next door, in which nine members of the a-Dalu family were killed.

Name: Yara Jamal Mahmoud a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Ranin Jamal Mahmoud a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Soheila Mahmoud Yasin a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Tahani Hasunah Ahmad a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Ibrahim Muhammad Jamal a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of his family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Sarah Muhammad Jamal a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of her family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Yusef Muhammad Jamal a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine memebers of his family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Jamal Muhammad Jamal a-Dalu
Notes: Killed with another nine members of his family in their house. Also killed in that bombing were two members of the al-Maznar family from the house next door.

Name: Iyad Yusef Ahmad Abu Khusah
Notes: Killed in the yard of his house.

Name: Jomanah Salamah Ibrahim Ise'ifan
Notes: Killed in his sleep while at home with other family members. His sister was also killed.

Name: Tamer Salamah Ibrahim Ise'ifan
Notes: Killed in his sleep while at home with other family members. His sister was also killed.

Name: Husam Samir Saleh al-Hams
Notes: Wounded at a soccer pitch in Tal a-Sultan in Rafah with other armed men, one of whom was killed on the spot. Died of his injuries on 29 November 2012.

Name: Salem Ahmad Salem Ben Sa'id
Notes: Killed while sitting with his family and neighbors in his father's shed near their house. Two more people were killed during the attack.

Name: Rushdi Mahmoud Hassan a-Tamimi
Notes: Wounded by soldiers' firing during a demonstration in which youths threw stones at the soldiers. Died of his injuries two days later.

Name: Muhammad Mahmoud 'Omar Yasin
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel from an agricultural area in the a-Zeitun section of Gaza City together with other armed men.

Name: Tamer Khaled Ahmad al-Hamari
Notes: A commander in the organization, killed while walking in Deir al-Balah.

Name: Hani 'Abd al-Majid Salem Brei'em
Notes: Killed while sitting with his family and neighbors in a shed near the home of one of them. Two more people were killed during the attack.

Name: Ahmad Salem Salamah Ben Sa'id
Notes: Killed while sitting with his family and neighbors in a shed near his house. Two more people were killed during the attack.

Name: Muhammad Sabri 'Odeh al-'Oweidat
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with two other armed men.

Name: 'Ali Hassan 'Ali Ben Sa'id
Notes: Killed while he was with other people near his house, in eastern Deir al-Balah.

Name: Samaher Khalil Mahmoud Qdeih
Notes: Killed when she left her house to go with her family to a more secure house.

Name: Ousamah Yusef Mansur al-Qadi
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle in Rafah, together with another armed man.

Name: Muhammad Saleh Ishteiwi a-Lolahi
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at an agricultural area in Rafah to launch rockets. Another man who arrived to rescue the wounded was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Ousamah Muhammad al-Atrash
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at an agricultural area in Rafah to launch rockets. Another armed man who arrived to rescue the wounded was also killed.

Name: 'Abd a-Rahman Salem Samarah al-Masri
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at an agricultural area in Rafah to launch rockets. Another man who arrived to rescue the wounded was also killed.

Name: 'Awad Hamdi Hassan a-Nahal
Notes: Killed by a missile while trying to rescue an armed man wounded in a bombing a short while earlier, in an agricultural area near his house in Rafah.

Name: Mukhles Mahmoud 'Abdallah 'Udwan
Notes: Killed at a soccer pitch in the Tal a-Sultan area of Rafah with other armed men; another armed man died of his wounds about two weeks later.

Name: Ousamah Musa Hassan 'Abd al-Jawad
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at agricultural land north of al-Maghazi R.C.

Name: Ashraf Hassan a-Sayed Abu Darwish
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at agricultural land north of al-Maghazi R.C.

Name: 'Ali 'Abd al-Hakim 'Ali al-Mana'mah
Notes: Killed with two other armed men while at agricultural land north of al-Maghazi R.C.

Name: 'Abdallah Mahmoud 'Abd al-Fatah 'Asqoul
Notes: Wounded while launching rockets at Israel together with another armed man, who was also killed. Died of his injuries on 12 December 2012.

Name: Ahmad Isma'il Muhammad Msameh
Notes: Wounded while riding a motorcycle with Khaled a-Sha'er and another armed man near the hospital in Deir al-Balah. Died of his injuries a week later.

Name: Ramadan Ahmad Ramadan Mahmoud
Notes: Wounded while riding a motorcycle with Khaled a-Sha'er and another armed man near the hospital in Deir al-Balah. Died of his wounds three lays later.

Name: Ayman Rafiq Hassan Islim
Notes: Killed during a meeting with other armed men in a-Shujayah, Gaza City.

Name: Khaled Khalil 'Ali a-Sha'er
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle near a hospital in Deir al-Balah, together with two other armed men who were wounded and died of their injuries a few days later.

Name: Hassan Salem Salim al-Hmeile'
Notes: Killed while at agricultural land in al-Maghazi R.C. with other people. Also killed were two armed men and another man.

Name: Ziad Farhan Suliman Abu Jalal
Notes: Killed while at agricultural land in al-Maghazi R.C. with other people. Also killed were two armed men who were his relatives, and another man.

Name: Amjad Muhammad Jadu' Abu Jalal
Notes: Killed while at agricultural land in al-Maghazi R.C. with his brother, a commander in the military wing of Hamas who was also killed, and with other people, two of whom were also killed.

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Jadu' Abu Jalal
Notes: A commander in the military wing of Hamas, killed while at agricultural land in al-Maghazi R.C. with his brother, an activist with the military wing of Hamas who was also killed, and with other people, two of whom were also killed.

Name: Yunes Kamel 'Abdallah Tafesh
Notes: Killed on his bicycle when riding home from paying a condolence call to the family of the infant girl Hanin Tafesh who had been killed the day before.

Name: Isma'il Khatab 'Omar Qandil
Notes: Killed while trying to fire rockets at Israel together with another armed man, who died of his wounds about a month later.

Name: Muhammad Talal Sa'id Salman
Notes: Killed while sitting with family members in their yard at home, in a bombing that also killed a female relative.

Name: Tahrir Ziad Muhammad Salman
Notes: Killed while sitting in her yard with other family members, one of whom was also killed in the bombing.

Name: Ahmad 'Awad Mahmoud Abu 'Alayan
Notes: Wounded while picking olives in Abasan al-Jadidah with a relative, who was also wounded. Died of his injuries six days later.

Name: Hanin Khaled Ahmad Tafesh
Notes: Wounded in the bombing of her house and died of her injuries later that day.

Name: Fares Ahmad Diab al-Bassiuni
Notes: Killed while at home with his family by a fragment from a missile that was fired at a neighboring house and killed another child there.

Name: 'Udai Jamal 'Abd al-Karim Naser
Notes: Killed while at home with his family. A fragment of the missile hit a neighboring house and killed another child there.

Name: Marwan 'Abd a-Rahman Muhammad Abu al-Qumsan
Notes: Killed while tring to leave his brother's house for open ground near the house.

Name: Walid Mahmoud 'Abd al-Fatah 'Abdallah
Notes: Killed while he was with other family members on farmland near his house in al-Qararah (Khan Yunis).

Name: Khaled 'Abd a-Rahman Abu Naser
Notes: Killed just after launching rockets at Israel with another armed man, also killed.

Name: Rani Mahmoud 'Abd a-Rahman Hammad
Notes: Killed just after launching rockets at Israel with another armed man, also killed.

Name: Habes Hassan 'Awad Mesmeh
Notes: Killed while trying to launch rockets, together with two other armed men who were also killed.

Name: Hisham Muhammad Ahmad al-Ghalban
Notes: Killed while trying to launch rockets, together with two other armed men who were also killed.

Name: Wael Haydar Sa'id al-Ghalban
Notes: Killed while trying to launch rockets, together with two other armed men who were also killed.

Name: Mahmoud Hamad Mahmoud Abu Sawawin
Notes: Killed while going on foot to check on a sheep pen on land adjoining his house, after the army bombed a house across the road that belonged to a Hamas activist and apparently served as a weapons cache.

Name: 'Issam Mahmoud Ahmad Abu al-Ma'azah
Notes: Killed while riding a moped with another armed man on Omar al-Mukhtar Street in Gaza City who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Hani Ibrahim al-Kaseih
Notes: Killed while riding a moped with another armed man on Omar al-Mukhtar Street in Gaza City who was also killed.

Name: Runan Yusef Jalal 'Arafat
Notes: Killed in the collapse of walls in his house in a-Zeitun, Gaza City, when a nearby orchard was bombed.

Name: Muhammad Hamed Subhi al-Hams
Notes: Killed while riding in a car on Omar al-Mukhtar Street in Gaza City, together with Ahmad al-Jabari, who was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Sa'id Khalil al-Ja'bri
Notes: A commander of the military wing of Hamas in the Gaza Strip. Killed while riding in a car on Omar al-Mukhtar Street in Gaza City, together with Muhammad al-Hams, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Fouad Muhammad A'beid
Notes: Killed while launching rockets, together with another armed man, from an agricultural area in the eastern part of Jabalya R.C.

Name: Muhammad Sa'id Muhammad Shkukani
Notes: Killed while launching rockets at Israel together with other armed men, from an agricultural area in the northern part of Gaza City.

Name: Muhammad Ziad 'Abdallah Qanu'
Notes: Wounded and killed with two other people as they went on foot to aid young people injured by shooting a few minutes earlier while playing soccer. Among the young people injured by the earlier firing, two died. A short time before the youths came under fire, armed Palestinians had fired an anti-tank missile at a military reconnaisance jeep near the perimeter fence.

Name: Matar 'Imad 'Abd a-Rahman Abu al-'Ata
Notes: Wounded and killed with two other people, one of them armed, as they went on foot to aid young people injured by shooting a few minutes earlier while playing soccer. Among the young people injured by the earlier firing, two died. A short time before the youths came under fire, armed Palestinians had fired an anti-tank missile at a military reconnaissance jeep near the perimeter fence.

Name: Ahmad Kamel Muhammad a-Dardasawi
Notes: Wounded and killed with two other people, one of them armed, as they went on foot to aid young people injured by shooting a few minutes earlier while playing soccer. Among the young people injured by the earlier firing, two died. A short time before the youths came under fire, armed Palestinians had fired an anti-tank missile at a military reconnaissance jeep near the perimeter fence.

Name: Ahmad Mustafa Khaled Hararah
Notes: Killed while playing soccer with other youths. Two were wounded and killed on the spot and a few minutes later, more tank shells were fired, killing two other people at the scene. One other person at the scene who was a participant in hostilities was also wounded and died of his injuries three days later. A short time earlier, armed Palestinians fired an anti-tank missile at a military reconnaissance jeep near the perimeter fence.

Name: Muhammad Ousamah Hassan Hararah
Notes: Killed while playing soccer with other youths. Two were wounded and killed on the spot and a few minutes later, more tank shells were fired, killing two other people at the scene. One other person at the scene who was a participant in hostilities was also wounded and died of his injuries three days later. A short time earlier, armed Palestinians fired an anti-tank missile at a military reconnaissance jeep near the perimeter fence.

Name: Ahmad Yunes Khader Abu Daqah
Notes: Killed while playing soccer with friends when Israeli military entered Gaza Strip in region of ‘Abasan al-Kabirah.

Name: Ahmad Tawfiq 'Awad a-Nabahin
Notes: Killed when he approached the perimeter fence in the eastern part of al-Bureij R.C.

Name: Salman Kamel Salman al-Qara
Notes: Killed while preparing to fire rockets at Israel together with other armed persons.

Name: Ahmad Fawzi Muhammad Hirzallah
Notes: Wounded after firing mortar shells at Israel together with another armed person, who was killed. He died of his wounds the following day.

Name: Muhammad Jaber Sha'ban a-Sheikh
Notes: Killed after firing mortar shells at Israel together with another armed person, who died of his wounds the following day.

Name: Yusef Muhammad Ibrahim Abu Jalhum
Notes: Wounded while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons, one of whom was also killed. He died of his wounds the following day.

Name: Isma'il 'Issa Matar a-Talli
Notes: Killed while launching rockets at Israel together with other armed persons, one of whom died of his wounds the following day.

Name: Luai 'Abd al-Hakim Mustafa Abu Jarad
Notes: Killed while firing mortar shells at Israel together with other armed persons.

Name: Yasser Jum'ah Jkheideb a-Tarabin
Notes: Killed while en route to launch rockets at Israel together with other armed persons.

Name: 'Abd a-Rahman Darwish Mustafa Abu Jalalah
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons

Name: Yasser Muhammad Sakher Ibrahim al-'Attal
Notes: Killed while en route to launch rockets at Israel together with another armed person.

Name: Ashraf Nimer Harb Sabah
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with another armed person.

Name: Hisham 'Ali 'Abd al-Karim a-Sa'idani
Notes: A senior figure in the organization. Killed while riding a motorcycle with another armed person.

Name: 'Abdallah Hassan Muhammad Makawi
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with another armed person.

Name: Anis Muhammad Mahmoud Abu al-'Anin
Notes: A senior figure in the organization. Killed while riding in a vehicle together with another armed person in Rafah who was also killed.

Name: Ashraf Mahmoud Muhammad Saleh
Notes: Killed riding in a vehicle with Anis Abu al-Aineen, a senior figure in Defenders of Al-Aqsa.

Name: Akram Sami Ahmad a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed while trying to plant mines together with two other armed persons, who were also killed.

Name: Tareq Soheil Ibrahim al-Kafarneh
Notes: Killed while trying to plant mines together with two other armed persons, who were also killed.

Name: Ihab Sami Ahmad a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed while trying to plant mines together with two other armed persons, who were also killed.

Name: Khalil Faraj Muhammad al-Jarbeh
Notes: Killed while trying to launch missiles at Israel together with other armed persons of whom two were also killed

Name: Zakaria Mamduh 'Omar al-Jamal
Notes: Killed while trying to launch missiles at Israel together with other armed persons of whom two were also killed

Name: Khaled Salah Muslem al-Qaram
Notes: Killed while trying to launch missiles at Israel together with other armed persons of whom two were also killed

Name: 'Eid 'Okal Muhammad Hijazi
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with another armed person

Name: Hassan Badi'a 'Omar a-Tabar
Notes: Killed when Border Police fired at the car in which he was riding, together with other workers, at the entrance to the a-Za'eem checkpoint. The car was transporting workers to employment in Israel without permits and the driver tried to flee from the checkpoint.

Name: Yasser 'Abdallah 'Awad al-Far
Notes: Shot to death by soldiers when approaching the perimeter fence while armed with a rifle

Name: Mahmoud Muhammad Isma'il al-Hiqi
Notes: Killed while trying to fire rockets, together with additional armed persons, at tanks that entered the Shuja'iya neighborhood.

Name: Khaled Naser a-Din Muhammad al-Bura'i
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons in the eastern part of Beit Lahiya.

Name: Ousamah Mahmoud Muhammad 'Ali
Notes: Killed when a missile hit a high stone wall next to him and dislodged stones that fell on him. The missile was apparently shot at armed persons riding a motorcycle on the same street.

Name: Isma'il 'Abdallah Hassan Ahmad
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons on agricultural land in the eastern part of al-Bureij refugee camp.

Name: Hamam Jamal Sa'id Abu Qadus
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle after firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons.

Name: Ghaleb 'Awwad 'Ayad Irmeilat
Notes: Killed while riding a motorcycle with another armed person. According to the IDF Spokesperson, he was involved in a terror attack on the Israeli-Egyptian border on 11 June 2012

Name: Maamun Muhammad Zuhdi a-Dam
Notes: Killed when hit by a missile as he played near his parents on agricultural land belonging to them east of a-Zeitun in Gaza City.

Name: Yusef Saber Muslem a-Talbani
Notes: Killed while trying to enter Israel together with two other young men, one of whom was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Bassam Shukri Abu Mu'eiliq
Notes: Killed while trying to enter Israel together with two other young men, one of whom was also killed.

Name: Jihad Kamel Muhammad Abu Shabab
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with two other armed persons, one of whom was also killed.

Name: 'Abdallah Hassan Ahmad a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with two other armed persons, one of whom was also killed.

Name: Isma'il Muhammad 'Abdallah Abu 'Odeh
Notes: Killed riding a motorcycle while conducting visual observation together with another armed person, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Rafiq Ahmad Shabat
Notes: Killed riding a motorcycle while conducting visual observation together with another armed person, who was also killed.

Name: Ahmad Ahmad Naser Abu Naser
Notes: Killed during an exchange of fire near the Gaza perimeter fence, after killing a soldier.

Name: Suraqah Rashad Shihadah Qdeih
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons, one of whom was also killed.

Name: Naji Fawzi Fares Qdeih
Notes: Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed persons, one of whom was also killed.

Name: Hashem Musbah Salem Sa'ed
Notes: Killed when he approached within c. 300 meters of the perimeter fence.

Name: Bilal Yusef Ibrahim a-Sa'aydeh
Notes: Killed when he approached the perimeter fence while armed with a rifle, digging tools and a knife.

Name: Mahmoud Muhammad Yihya Zaqut
Notes: Killed after being shot by soldiers from a guard tower at the Erez crossing during a nearby Land Day demonstration, when stones were thrown at the tower.

Name: Rashad Dhib Hassan Shawakhah
Notes: Killed after being shot by soldiers in civilian clothing and uniformed soldiers. Two of the soldiers in civilian clothing had approached his house after midnight; he and his two brothers, suspecting thieves, went out to meet them armed with a knife and a club. The soldiers did not identify themselves and fired initially at one of his brothers. When he and his other brother responded by trying to attack the soldiers, they fired at them, too. Uniformed soldiers who arrived at the scene shot him again while he was lying injured on the ground. He died of his wounds six days later.

Name: Hamadah Salman Ahmad Abu Mutlaq
Notes: Killed by an Israel Air Force bombardment after other armed men launched rockets from the same area he was in.

Name: Raafat Jawwad Adib Abu 'Eid
Notes: Killed by an Israel Air Force bombardment while near his house together with other armed men.

Name: Muhammad Amin Ahmad Daher
Notes: Killed while trying to fire a rocket at Israel together with other armed men in the a-Shuja'iyeh neighborhood of Gaza City; one of the other men was also killed.

Name: Bassam Salem Diab al-'Ajleh
Notes: Killed while trying to fire a rocket at Israel together with other armed men in the a-Shuja'iyeh neighborhood of Gaza City; one of the other men was also killed.

Name: Fayzeh Muhammad Mustafa al-Hassumi
Notes: Killed together with her father while they tried to extinguish a fire caused by a rocket that landed on their farmland.

Name: Muhammad Mustafa 'Awad al-Hassumi
Notes: Killed along with his daughter when they tried to extinguish a fire caused by a rocket that landed on their farmland.

Name: Ahmad Nafez Saber Dhib
Notes: 10.	Killed while firing rockets at Israel together with other armed men in the a-Zeitoun neighborhood of Gaza City.

Name: 'Adel Saleh Fares al-Asi
Notes: Killed by an Israel Air Force bombardment of farmland where he was working, after armed men from Islamic Jihad fired rockets from the area.

Name: Ayub 'Amer Muhammad 'Asaliyah
Notes: Killed near his house while playing with another child on farmland from which rockets had been fired several minutes earlier.

Name: Mahdi Ahmad Mahmoud Abu Shawish
Notes: Killed when about to ride his motorcycle in the tunnel area of Rafah.

Name: Mansur Kamal Muhammad Abu Nserah
Notes: Killed while conducting observation near the perimeter fence together with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Hussein Salim Hussein Barham
Notes: Killed while conducting observation  near the perimeter fence together with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Muhammad Yihya Muhammad al-Maghari
Notes: Killed alongside another armed man at the eastern entrance to Beit Lahia; the second man was also killed.

Name: Mahmoud Isma'il Mustafa Nijm
Notes: Killed alongside another armed man at the eastern entrance to Beit Lahia; the second man was also killed.

Name: Fayeq Samir Nimer Sa'ed
Notes: Killed while walking in central Gaza after launching a rocket at Israel together with two other armed men, who were also killed.

Name: Ahmad 'Abd al-Fatah Yusef Hajjaj
Notes: Killed while walking in central Gaza after launching a rocket at Israel together with two other armed men, who were also killed.

Name: Mu'tasem Diab Ghanem Hajjaj
Notes: Killed while walking in central Gaza after launching a rocket at Israel together with two other armed men, who were also killed.

Name: Muhammad Ibrahim Hamad al-Ghumari
Notes: Killed in a vehicle with other armed men at the entrance to Deir al-Balah while preparing to fire rockets at Israel.

Name: Mahmoud Ahmad Hanani
Notes: Killed while riding in a vehicle with the Secretary General of the Popular Resistance Committee, who was also killed.

Name: Zuheir Musa Ahmad al-Qaysi
Notes: 18.	Secretary General of the Popular Resistance Committee. Killed while riding in a vehicle with another armed man, who was also killed.

Name: Shadi Riyad Baker a-Siqali

Name: Salah Muhammad Kamel Qawariq
Notes: Killed with his relative Muhammad Qawariq by soldiers’ gunfire while looking for metal on farmland east of ‘Awarta.

Name: Muhammad Feisal Mahmoud Qawariq
Notes: Killed with his relative Saleh Qawariq by soldiers’ gunfire while looking for metal on farmland east of ‘Awarta.

Name: Usayed Abd al-Naser Muhammad Qadus
Notes: Killed by soldier’s gunfire during a demonstration held by residents of Iraq Burin in the village.

Name: Muhammad Ibrahim 'Abd al-Qader Qadus
Notes: Killed by soldier’s gunfire during a demonstration held by residents of Iraq Burin in the village.

Name: Muhammad Ashraf 'Abd Rabo Ghaben
Notes: He was killed by tank shelling while trying, with a group of armed men, to lay an explosive charge next to the perimeter fence.

Name: Faiz Ahmad Sa'id Faraj
Notes: The army contends that he was shot after he tried to stab soldiers. B'Tselem’s investigation indicates that he and soldiers had a physical altercation, after which he moved away from them. The soldiers then fired at him, hitting him in the leg. When he fell, the soldiers shot several times. The soldiers then delayed him from receiving medical treatment and he died of his wounds.

Name: Fares Akram Ahmad Jaber
Notes: Active in the military wing of Fatah, he was killed by missile fire while with a group of armed men.

Name: Huzaifah Muhammad Subhi al-Hams
Notes: Killed while on his way with other armed men to fire rockets at Israel.

Name: 'Awad Muhammad 'Awad Abu Nseir
Notes: Killed while on his way with other armed men to fire rockets at Israel.

Name: Hassan Ibrahim 'Abd a-Rahim al-Qatrawi
Notes: Killed while on his way with other armed men to fire rockets at Israel.

Name: Naser Jum'ah 'Eid a-Tarabin
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel.

Name: 'Udai Muhammad Sabah Abu Hish
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel.

Name: Mubarak Ruba'a Rabi' Abu Shaluf
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel.

Name: Mahmoud Ahmad Difallah 'Abd a-Ghafur
Notes: Killed while moving around with other armed men.

Name: Jihad 'Abd a-Rahim Ahmad a-Smeiri
Notes: Killed while moving around with other armed men.

Name: Bashir Suliman Musa Abu Duheil
Notes: Killed while trying to sneak into Israel to look for work.

Name: Mahmoud Jum'ah Ibrahim a-Sharathah
Notes: Killed while trying to sneak into Israel to look for work.

Name: Hani Salem Muhammad Abu Ghazal
Notes: Killed while trying to sneak into Israel to look for work.

Name: 'Anan Suliman Mustafa Subuh
Notes: Soldiers shot him to death inside his house after he refused to reply to their calls to go outside to them.

Name: Nader 'Abd al-Jabbar Muhammad a-Sarkaji
Notes: Shot to death by soldiers without warning after they encircled his house and ordered him to go outside.

Name: Ghassan Fathi Nayef Abu Sharkh
Notes: Shot to death by soldiers without warning after they encircled his house and ordered him to go outside.

Name: Mustafa Muhammad Saber Wadi
Notes: Killed by soldiers' gunfire while he and his friends were  300 meters west of the eastern border of the Gaza Strip. Another youth was wounded and taken for treatment to Barzilai Hospital (in Israel).

Name: Naser Yusef Muhammad al-Ja'ran (Abu Seif)
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel adjacent to the Egyptian border.

Name: Rizeq Muhammad Ibrahim al-Masri
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel next to the Egyptian border.

Name: Muhammad Salem Birawi Marshud
Notes: Killed when he and other armed men fired rockets at Israel.

Name: Mahmoud Musa Ramadan al-Bana
Notes: Killed when he and other armed men fired rockets at Israel.

Name: Kamel Khaled Sha'ban a-Dahduh
Notes: Killed when he and other armed men fired rockets at Israel.

Name: Rabi' Walid 'Issa a-Tawil
Notes: Killed by gunfire at his auto when he tried to leave a gas station near Mevo Betar. An army jeep tried to block his way, and when he continued, soldiers got out of the jeep and opened massive gunfire at this auto.

Name: 'Abd al-Hafez Khalil Musa a-Silawi
Notes: Killed after he and Mahmud Nuseir placed an explosive charge.

Name: Mahmoud Ahmad Muhammad Nuseir
Notes: Killed after he and 'Abd al-Hafez a-Silawi placed an explosive charge.

Name: Ghazi Maher Ghazi a-Z'anin
Notes: Killed while in an agricultural area with friends and family.

Name: Muhammad Riyad Nayef 'Alian
Notes: Killed by gunfire of soldiers who were in an army observation post at the entrance to the Beit El settlement, while he was 70 meters from the tower, at night. According to the army, he threw a petrol bomb.

Name: 'Obaydah Maher 'Abd al-Mu'ti al-Qudsi
Notes: Shot after he tried to stab a soldier at Police Square Checkpoint (a-Zawiya Gate).

Name: Ibrahim 'Ali Muhammad al-Batnijy
Notes: An activist in the military wing of Hamas, he was killed while working in tunnels.

Name: Nael 'Ali Muhammad al-Batnijy
Notes: Killed while working in tunnels.

Name: Mansur 'Ali Muhammad al-Batnijy
Notes: Killed while working in tunnels.

Name: Sa'id 'Ata Muhammad al-Hassumi
Notes: Killed while with his brother and friend, who was severely wounded, close to the perimeter fence.

Name: Ahmad Zuheir Mahmoud a-Sumari
Notes: Mentally disabled, he was killed when he approached Nahal Oz.

Name: Hiyam Salim 'Abd al-'Aziz Abu 'Aish
Notes: Killed while at home, which was about 1300 meters from the perimeter fence, while armed men were approaching the border.

Name: Fahed Muhammad al-Minawi
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near east of Gaza city.

Name: Hani Muhammad Salem a-Tarabin
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near east of Gaza city.

Name: Taher 'Issa Muhammad 'Issa
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near east of Gaza city.

Name: 'Aqel Sadeq 'Abd a-Rahman Srur
Notes: Killed during a demonstration next to the Separation Barrier in N'ilin.

Name: 'Abd al-Majid 'Ali 'Abdallah Dudin
Notes: Wanted by Israel. Member of the military wing of Hamas. he was killed when soldier came to arrest him.

Name: Yasin Salim Yasin Jasser
Notes: Killed while he and 'Abd al-Majed Saleh tried  to place a bomb next to the border, after soldiers at the Kerem Shalom crossing noticed them and shot them.

Name: 'Abd al-Majid Sa'id Musa Saleh
Notes: Killed while he and Yassin Jasser tried  to place a bomb next to the border, after soldiers at the Kerem Shalom crossing noticed them and shot them.

Name: Hamam Muhammad Burhan Naser a-Din
Notes: Killed while he tried to enter al-Haram al-Ibrahimi Mosque (Cave of Machpelah).

Name: Jihad Khalil Muhammad Abu Jaradah
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel.

Name: Hamdan Fa'iq Muhammad al-Astal
Notes: Killed while working in a tunnel.

Name: Muhammad 'Ali Nawar Hamdan
Notes: Killed while he and his friends were about to hurl petrol bombs at houses in a settlement.

Name: Bassem Ibrahim Ahmad Abu Rahma
Notes: Killed during a demonstration.

Name: Iyad 'Azmi 'Ali 'Aweisat
Notes: Killed after he tried to run over a border policeman during the demolition of a house in the village.

Name: Muhammad Na'im Muhammad al-Hamaydah
Notes: Killed while he and Jamal Qafa tried to place an explosive charge about 120 meters from the eastern border with Israel.

Name: Jamil Muhammad 'Aref Qafah
Notes: Killed while he and Muhammad al-Hamida tried to place an explosive charge about 120 meters from the eastern border with Israel.

Name: 'Abdallah Mahmoud Salem Isbetan
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near the Israeli border.

Name: 'Ali Muhammad Mahmoud Abu Ful
Notes: Killed in an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near the Israeli border.

Name: Faiz Fares Faiz 'Ata
Place of residence: Deir Abu Mash'al, Ramallah and al-Bira
Event location: Deir Abu Mash'al, Ramallah and al-Bira
Notes: Killed by a shot in the back when soldiers chased him and his friends after they had thrown petrol bombs. His friend was injured and taken for treatment inside Israel.

Name: Mahmoud Sami Hassan Fatuh
Notes: An activist in the military wing of  Islamic Jihad, he was killed while riding in a car after firing rockets at Israel.

Name: Wasim Hassan Hussein Mansur
Notes: Killed while at an observation point  with other armed men east of al-Maghazi refugee camp.

Name: Ibrahim Hassan Dawood Bamba
Notes: Killed while at an observation point  with other armed men east of al-Maghazi refugee camp.

Name: Mahmoud al-'Abed Saleh Hammad
Notes: Killed while at an observation point  with other armed men east of al-Maghazi refugee camp.

Name: Mahdi Sa'id Muhammad Abu 'Ayash
Notes: Wounded by a shot to the head while he was in the street with a group of youths some of whom threw stones at an army vehicle.

Name: Khaled Harb Khaled Sh'alan
Notes: Killed while riding in his car.

Name: Hammad Barrak Salem Salimeh
Notes: Killed while gracing his flock 300 metes from the perimeter fence.

Name: 'Ali 'Abd al-Bari Ibrahim al-Qadrah
Notes: He was killed while riding on a motor scooter.

Name: 'Iz a-Din Radwan Radwan al-Jamal
Notes: Killed while standing on the roof of a house and throwing stones at soldiers at the pharmacy checkpoint.

Name: Miqbal Yusef Muhammad Abu 'Odeh
Notes: Killed, while wearing an explosive belt, following an exchange of gunfire with soldiers near the perimeter fence.

Name: Khaled Rafiq Diab al-Kafarneh
Notes: Killed during an exchange of gunfire with soldiers  near the perimeter fence.

Name: Fouad Riyad Faiz Hamdan
Notes: Killed while trying to place an explosive charge next to the Israeli border.

Name: 'Alaa 'Issam Sharif Abu a-Rob
Notes: Member of the military wing of the Islamic Jihad. he was killed when soldiers who had come to his house shot him and later blew up the house.

Name: Ayman Shihadah Muhammad Abu Jazar
Notes: Killed while he was driving in a car with two other armed men, who were wounded. They apparently had previously fired rockets at Israel.

Name: Taysir Shehdeh Muhammad Manasrah
Notes: Killed while trying to sneak into Israel in his car.

Name: Hussein Faiz Hussein Shameyah
Notes: Killed while riding on a motor scooter in al-'Aqad area.

Name: Na'im 'Aref Ishteiwi
Notes: Fragments of a missile were found on his body.
